name: THE BALL with the ability to switch dimensions
name_original: THE BALL with the ability to switch dimensions
description:
This is a unique platformer video game.

Play as the ball, use the ultimate skill【SWITCH】to overcome obstacles, get coins and reach the goal.

【SWITCH】is the core of this platformer game, it can change the dimensions in the game world from 2D and 3D. How to use the ability in limited time is the key to complete this game.
